content: मानिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मान-इनि, मन्-णिनि वा] {@--1@} Fancying, considering, regarding (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); as in पंडितमानिन्. {@--2@} Honouring, respecting, (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--3@} Haughty, proud, possessed of self-respect; पराभवोऽप्युत्सव एव मानिनां <ls>Ki. 1. 41</ls>; परवृद्धिमत्सरि मनो हि मानिनां <ls>Śi. 15. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Entitled to respect, highly honoured; <ls>Bk. 19. 24.</ls> {@--5@} Disdainful, angry, sulky. {@--6@} Being regarded or considered as. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A lion. --नी {@--1@} A woman possessed of self-respect, a strong-minded, resolute, or proud woman, (in a good sense): चतुर्दिगीशानवमत्य मानिनी <ls>Ku. 5. 53</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 38.</ls> {@--2@} An angry woman, or one offended with her husband (through jealous pride); माधवे मा कुरु मानिनि मानमये <ls>Gīt. 9</ls>; <ls>Ki. 9. 36.</ls> {@--3@} A kind of odoriferous plant.
